api_list.name: /url: api.wpquoteoftheday.com/quote/{topic_id}
api_list.description: Returns random quote with necessary topic

api_list.name: /url: api.wpquoteoftheday.com/category
api_list.description: Returns all available topics with id and name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://syqel-quote-of-the-day-v1.p.rapidapi.com/url: api.wpquoteoftheday.com/category"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "syqel-quote-of-the-day-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
